method.name: Swap1

reference.ref: M. Sholom, N. Indurkhya. Optimized Rule Induction. IEEE Expert 1 (1993) 61-70.

generalDescription.objective: To determine a rule set able to classify correctly new test patterns
generalDescription.howWork: The algorithm tries to find rules that are 100 percent predictive by iteratively adding or swapping components to the rules.When the full set of rules has been found, a cleaning process is performed to avoid overfitting.
